ygData.subject: Re: Siref and Scryed
ygData.msgSnippet: Siref smiled at Scryed Heh, you ll be ok...I m Siref, front infantry unit, pleased to meet ya! he said while putting his gun back. ... we?

Siref smiled at Scryed "Heh, you'll be ok...I'm Siref, front infantry 
unit, pleased to meet ya!" he said while putting his gun back.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Scryed--
> 
> Scryed looks up, spots a fellow maximal and smiles, "Hello, I'm 
> Scryed, and no I don't think I've met you yet." She walks over to 
> Siref, checking out the large greyish bot, and sits down beside him.
> 
> "I'm giving myself a self tour of the base right now, a lot of it is 
> new to me." She says indicating that she'd just been in the engine 
> room.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > Siref was sitting in the hallway checking at his gun and preparing 
> > it in case there was a battle.And most of himself was taking all 
> the 
> > place, until he sees Scryed coming. "Hia lady!" he said 
> > interested "I don't think we have seen each other before don't 
we?"
> > 
> > [Black Ben's post which was accidentally sent to my inbox.]
